org.xbmc.api.data

Interface IVideoClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IClient
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    VideoClient

    public interface IVideoClient
extends IClient
    This is the interface between the business layer and the presentation layer. All the business layer gets to see is this interface.
    Author:
    Team XBMC

      • setPlaylistPosition

        boolean setPlaylistPosition(INotifiableManager manager,
                          int position)
        Sets the media at position position to be the next item to be played.
        Parameters:
        position - New position, starting with 0.
        Returns:
        True on success, false otherwise.

      • getPlaylist

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getPlaylist(INotifiableManager manager)
        Returns the first PLAYLIST_LIMIT videos of the playlist.
        Returns:
        Videos in the playlist.

      • removeFromPlaylist

        boolean removeFromPlaylist(INotifiableManager manager,
                         java.lang.String path)
        Removes media from the current playlist. It is not possible to remove the media if it is currently being played.
        Parameters:
        position - Complete path (including filename) of the media to be removed.
        Returns:
        True on success, false otherwise.
